channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Next Time Nike Is Tempted To Run A Feminist Super Bowl Ad, Just Don’t Do It
item.description: Nike’s big celebration of women is actually demeaning.

item.title: The Drug Crisis Hasn’t Gone Away. The Trump Administration Should Confront It
item.description: It’s time to overhaul drug policies and strengthen America’s commitment to reducing and delegitimizing drug use.

item.title: Trump Would Need Eight Years
item.description: Most of his executive branch actions won’t have staying power if Democrats retake the White House in 2028.

item.title: How States Can Assert Financial Freedom
item.description: Balancing the budget over the business cycle is a smart strategy.

item.title: Trump says paper straws are out, plastic is in
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order Monday calling for the return of plastic straws and doing away with paper ones.

item.title: Wheaton’s Cowardice In The Face Of Russ Vought Attacks Is Emblematic Of Its Leftward Lurch

item.title: GOP lawmakers set sights on PBS, NPR amid Trump's DOGE crackdown

item.title: Not Tired Of Losing, The Left Doubles Down On Standing Up For Insanity
item.description: As Democrats rally around government waste, illegal immigration and out-of-touch liberals, polls show Americans are with President Trump.
